name: .3DA File Extension
summary: Learn about .3DA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Three-dimensional model created by various 3D modeling programs; stores a model in a plain text format, where each line of text specifies the vertices that determine the shape of the object.

content: 3DA files are used by Techland's ChromEd game engine, which was used to develop games such as GTI Racing.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
